titles.title: Hate Crime Statistics Improvement Act of 2007
To amend the Hate Crime Statistics Act to require the Attorney General to acquire data about crimes that manifest evidence of prejudice based on gender.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on the Judiciary.
Sponsor introductory remarks on measure. (CR E391)
Referred to the Subcommittee on Crime, Terrorism, and Homeland Security.

bill.summary:
2/16/2007--Introduced.
Hate Crime Statistics Improvement Act of 2007 - Amends the Hate Crime Statistics Act to require the Attorney General to acquire data about crimes that manifest evidence of prejudice based on gender.
